+#ifdef _WIN64
+#define EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
+#else
+#define EXPORT
+#endif
+
+struct A { int x; };
+
+EXPORT struct A foo1(int a);
+EXPORT struct A foo2(int allocator);
+EXPORT struct A foo3(int allocator, int _allocator);
